Module com.example.miniproyecto4
Package com.example.miniproyecto4.model.Utils

Class CoordsUtils

java.lang.Object
com.example.miniproyecto4.model.Utils.CoordsUtils
public class CoordsUtils extends Object
Utility class providing coordinate manipulation and conversion methods. Includes functions for distance calculation, adjacency checking, and conversion between grid coordinates and alphanumeric notation. This class cannot be instantiated.

  • Method Details

    • isAdjacent

      public static boolean isAdjacent(Coordinate c1, Coordinate c2)
      Checks if two coordinates are adjacent to each other. Two coordinates are adjacent if they differ by exactly 1 in either the x or y direction (but not diagonally).
      Parameters:
      c1 - the first coordinate
      c2 - the second coordinate
      Returns:
      true if the coordinates are adjacent, false otherwise

    • distance

      public static double distance(Coordinate c1, Coordinate c2)
      Calculates the Euclidean distance between two coordinates.
      Parameters:
      c1 - the first coordinate
      c2 - the second coordinate
      Returns:
      the distance between the two coordinates

    • toAlphanumeric

      public static String toAlphanumeric(Coordinate coordinate)
      Converts a grid coordinate to alphanumeric notation. For example, coordinate (0, 0) becomes "A1", (1, 0) becomes "A2", etc.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate to convert
      Returns:
      the alphanumeric representation of the coordinate

    • fromAlphanumeric

      public static Coordinate fromAlphanumeric(String alphanumeric)
      Converts an alphanumeric coordinate string to a grid coordinate. For example, "A1" becomes coordinate (0, 0), "B3" becomes (2, 1), etc.
      Parameters:
      alphanumeric - the alphanumeric string to convert (e.g., "A1", "B5")
      Returns:
      the corresponding coordinate, or null if the input is invalid
